topDeals.name: A wall decal of senior citizens in a golf cart
topDeals.description: Some people decorate their walls with wallpaper, and others with art. And you can make your own home stand out by decorating with this decal of senior citizens riding in a golf cart.
fectures: EASY AND FUN TO APPLY. SIMPLY PEEL AND STICK
DESIGNED, PRINTED, PACKED, AND SHIPPED IN THE USA

topDeals.name: A peanut butter and jelly of the month club
topDeals.description: If you’ve ever thought to yourself, “Spreading peanut butter and jelly on bread is too time-consuming,” Amazon has the answer. For just under $40 a month, you can enjoy gourmet peanut butter and jelly sandwiches, delivered straight to your door.
fectures: its good if you spread on a bread

topDeals.name: A pizza hat
topDeals.description: Finally, you can indulge in everyone’s life-long desire of wearing pizza atop their head. Beware the sprinkled parmesan as you nod or shake your head, though—some might mistake it for dandruff.
fectures: Looks like pepperoni and cheese pizza
As seen at carnivals, parades, theme parties
